snippet: We have received in The Detroit North-Western Advocate, the first part of Gov. SEWARD's argument in defense of the persons on trial, at Detroit, in the great Railroad Conspiracy case. It is, of course, too long for publication entire; we give, how...
lead_paragraph: We have received in The Detroit North-Western Advocate, the first part of Gov. SEWARD's argument in defense of the persons on trial, at Detroit, in the great Railroad Conspiracy case. It is, of course, too long for publication entire; we give, however, the opening passage:

headline.main: Michigan Conspirney Case--Argument of Gov. Seward.
